ValidationRule.description: AD-281 The ability to capture the Closed Reason on a Won, Lost or Withdrawn Opportunity. The ability to prompt the user with key questions for the Customer to ensure that 'Price' isn't defaulted to as the root cause of Opportunity Losses.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( !$Setup.OCS_Config_Settings_CSH__c.Validation_Rules_Disabled__c, RecordType.DeveloperName != "Target", OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName, '5. Closed Withdrawn'), ISPICKVAL(StageName, '6. Closed Lost'), ISPICKVAL(StageName, '7. Closed Won') ), ISBLANK(TEXT(Closed_Reason__c)), ISCHANGED(StageName) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please provide a Closed Reason and ensure you are using the Close Opportunity button.
